description:
Traveling to China, Japan, or Korea? Learning Chinese, Japanese or Korean? Instantly translate foreign text to English using your smartphone camera. No data connection needed. Go like a local. Now with romanized pronunciation! 

- Use your video camera as a translator and dictionary
- No data connection required
- See the pronunciation of the words
- Simply point and translate Chinese, Japanese, or Korean to English in Live Mode
- Translate photos in your library in Photo Mode
- Translate multiple lines of foreign text at the same time
- Translate text written vertically
- Share or save your translations

Waygo is the leader in visual translation services, easily translating images of printed text offline. Waygo translator has been featured repeatedly in TechCrunch, The Next Web, Tech In Asia, GigaOm, Forbes, Technode, e27 and VentureBeat as the top visual Chinese translator.

This Waygo free download is a limited version with 10 daily translations. Upgrade to Lifetime Use (using the menu) for unlimited translations for life! 

Waygo translator is compatible with the iPhone 4+ and iPad 2+ running iOS 6.0+.

TIPS
1. Best used on clear foreign text (currently does not recognize stylized fonts or calligraphy)
2. If the text is small, hold the phone 6 inches / 15 cm away and use the zoom slider to translate more clearly
3. If text is blurry, tap the screen to focus or use the zoom slider
4. If the image is dark, turn on the Light (flash) 

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
- Chinese (Simplified) to English
- Chinese (Traditional) to English
- Japanese to English
- Korean to English
- more coming soon!

Go to www.WaygoApp.com/menu to try Waygo translator now on a sample Chinese menu. WIth Waygo translator and dictionary, simply point your camera and translate foreign languages to English.

FOLLOW US
* Twitter at https://twitter.com/#!/WaygoApp
* Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/WaygoApp

NOTE FROM THE DEVELOPERS
We appreciate your feedback. Please send any questions or suggestions to feedback@waygoapp.com
releaseNotes:
* Speed improvements on newer (2012 - present) devices
* Enlarge the recognized text from your favorites or translation history to show to a waiter, cab driver, etc
* Bug fixes
